panels.description: find out which client cause server error
panels.title: Server Error (by client)

query.sql: show tag pod_group values from vtap_app_port

list.definition: {"database":"flow_metrics","sql":"SELECT pod_cluster as `value`, pod_cluster as `display_name` FROM `vtap_flow_port.1m` WHERE  time >= ${__from:date:seconds} AND time <= ${__to:date:seconds} GROUP BY `value` LIMIT 999999999999","useAny":true,"useDisabled":false}
list.label: DB Cluster
list.name: db_cluster

query.sql: SELECT pod_cluster as `value`, pod_cluster as `display_name` FROM `vtap_flow_port.1m` WHERE  time >= ${__from:date:seconds} AND time <= ${__to:date:seconds} GROUP BY `value` LIMIT 999999999999

list.definition: {"database":"flow_metrics","sql":"SELECT pod_service AS value , pod_service AS display_name FROM `vtap_app_port.1m` WHERE pod_cluster IN (${db_cluster:singlequote})  AND pod_service LIKE '$wildcard'  GROUP BY `value`","useAny":false,"useDisabled":true}
list.label: DB Service
list.name: db_service

query.sql: SELECT pod_service AS value , pod_service AS display_name FROM `vtap_app_port.1m` WHERE pod_cluster IN (${db_cluster:singlequote})  AND pod_service LIKE '$wildcard'  GROUP BY `value`
